clip.quote: Ask clients why they chose you to reinforce their decision and strengthen your relationship.
clip.why_clipworthy: This tactic can immediately improve client interactions and close rates.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to close more deals? Here's a simple question to ask at every listing appointment.

clip.quote: I may not be the right agent for you, and that's okay.
clip.why_clipworthy: This challenges the fear of losing clients by emphasizing the importance of fit.
clip.suggested_hook: Why being selective with clients can actually boost your business.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why saying 'I'm not the right agent for you' can skyrocket your success!",
    "SETUP": "Gemma Leggett shares how embracing the right client fit can transform your real estate business.",
    "INSIGHT": "Instead of fearing client loss, focus on fit. Gemma explains that aligning with the right clients enhances satisfaction and referrals, leading to more growth.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Being selective isn't about turning clients away; it's about ensuring mutual success and building a stronger brand.",
    "CTA": "Think about your ideal client. Are you aligning with them? Share your thoughts in the comments!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Being selective with clients can boost your business. Here's why! #RealEstateTips",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMindset", "#ClientSuccess", "#BusinessGrowth", "#RealEstateMarketing", "#SelectiveClients"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```
